title: Trump's Old-Timey Take on Video Game Violence | Vann R. Newkirk II
itunes:title: Trump's Old-Timey Take on Video Game Violence | Vann R. Newkirk II
description:
Amazon's Alexa creeps out its customers, President Trump suggests that video games cause gun violence, and Trevor chats with The Atlantic's Vann R. Newkirk II.
